item.title: Cleaning up my codebase
item.description: It took me one entire week to rewrite my codebase and reexamine some of the old (passed down from the original repo) designs. It was a painful process and I had procrastinated forever to do this, but I’m glad I did it. The main reason why I wanted to rewrite is that none of my tests give any meaningful results, no matter how I modify the encoder etc. So the first thing I did was to restructure the code to make sure everything gets called properly.
